tools.name: mcp__levys-awesome-mcp__mcp__agent-generator__generate_all_agents
tools.description: Generate markdown files for all available agent configurations

tools.name: mcp__levys-awesome-mcp__mcp__agent-generator__get_agent_info
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific agent

tools.name: mcp__levys-awesome-mcp__mcp__agent-generator__list_available_agents
tools.description: List all available agent configurations

tools.name: mcp__levys-awesome-mcp__mcp__agent-generator__remove_agent_markdowns
tools.description: Remove all generated agent markdown files

tools.name: mcp__levys-awesome-mcp__mcp__agent-invoker__invoke_agent
tools.description: Invoke another agent programmatically with enforced session.log creation

tools.name: mcp__levys-awesome-mcp__mcp__agent-invoker__list_agents
tools.description: List all available agents that can be invoked

tools.name: mcp__levys-awesome-mcp__mcp__build-executor__build_backend
tools.description: Build/typecheck the backend only

tools.name: mcp__levys-awesome-mcp__mcp__build-executor__build_frontend
tools.description: Build the frontend only

tools.name: mcp__levys-awesome-mcp__mcp__build-executor__build_project
tools.description: Build the entire project (backend typecheck + frontend build)

tools.name: mcp__levys-awesome-mcp__mcp__code-analyzer__code_quality_scan
tools.description: Run comprehensive code quality analysis

tools.name: mcp__levys-awesome-mcp__mcp__code-analyzer__dependency_check
tools.description: Check for outdated dependencies

tools.name: mcp__levys-awesome-mcp__mcp__code-analyzer__lint_javascript
tools.description: Run ESLint on JavaScript/TypeScript files

tools.name: mcp__levys-awesome-mcp__mcp__code-analyzer__security_scan
tools.description: Run security analysis using npm audit and bandit (for Python)

tools.name: mcp__levys-awesome-mcp__mcp__content-writer__backend_write
tools.description: Write files to the backend/ folder only.

tools.name: mcp__levys-awesome-mcp__mcp__content-writer__frontend_write
tools.description: Write files to the frontend/ folder only.

tools.name: mcp__levys-awesome-mcp__mcp__content-writer__get_summary
tools.description: Read a summary report file from reports/$SESSION_ID/ directory. Looks for any summary files in the session directory.

tools.name: mcp__levys-awesome-mcp__mcp__content-writer__put_summary
tools.description: Create a summary report file in reports/$SESSION_ID/${agent_name}-summary.json. Use this to create summary reports of agent execution.

tools.name: mcp__levys-awesome-mcp__mcp__content-writer__restricted_write
tools.description: Write files to a specified folder only. The invoking agent must provide the allowed folder.

tools.name: mcp__levys-awesome-mcp__mcp__plan-creator__create_plan
tools.description: Analyzes a task and creates a detailed execution plan with task breakdown, agent assignments, and dependencies. Saves the plan to reports/$git_commit_hash/

tools.name: mcp__levys-awesome-mcp__mcp__server-runner__run_dev_all
tools.description: Start both backend and frontend development servers

tools.name: mcp__levys-awesome-mcp__mcp__server-runner__run_dev_backend
tools.description: Start the backend development server

tools.name: mcp__levys-awesome-mcp__mcp__server-runner__run_dev_frontend
tools.description: Start the frontend development server

tools.name: mcp__levys-awesome-mcp__mcp__test-executor__run_tests
tools.description: Execute test suite with support for multiple test frameworks

tools.name: mcp__levys-awesome-mcp__mcp__test-executor__validate_and_run_tests
tools.description: Validate test environment and run comprehensive test suite

tools.name: mcp__levys-awesome-mcp__mcp__test-runner__run_backend_tests
tools.description: Run backend tests only (lint and typecheck)

tools.name: mcp__levys-awesome-mcp__mcp__test-runner__run_e2e_tests
tools.description: Run E2E tests only (root-level Playwright tests)

tools.name: mcp__levys-awesome-mcp__mcp__test-runner__run_frontend_tests
tools.description: Run frontend tests only (lint, build, and browser tests)

tools.name: mcp__levys-awesome-mcp__mcp__test-runner__test_runner
tools.description: Run all tests (backend, frontend, and E2E)
